title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Biden calls America "systemically racist" in response to George Floyd verdict. BLM organizer vows to "raise hell" in America. BLM protester says America is stolen land, Constitution is white supremacist. Nancy Pelosi thanks George Floyd for sacrificing his life. Rush says it best: We're not a racist country. House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy tried to censure Maxine Waters. Rush: Democrats are trying to incite a race war. EIB welcomes new Atlanta affiliate News Talk XTRA 106.3 FM! Ex-military, ex-law enforcement caller on race relations. Rush is right: Trump still scares them to death in Hannity interview. Callers on race relations. Wife of a police officer calls in.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

AOC and Democrats roll out the Green New Deal. Rush warned us Biden was all for it. When Charlton Heston called Rush to read from Jurassic Park as written by Michael Crichton. Callers comment on race in America. Senator Blackburn calls the Green New Deal communism. Rush on the insanity of the Green New Deal, radical leftist takeover of the Democrat Party. More callers on race and law enforcement.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Leftists want to capitalize Black, and keep white lowercase to combat white supremacy. Rush's Undeniable Truth of Life #34: Words Mean Things. Rush on how the left has stolen the language. Rush knew the dirty little secret about Andrew Cuomo. Caller who has had run-ins with law enforcement. More from Trump's interview on Fox. Rush on how the future of American democracy hinged on the 2020 election. EIB High Note: Rush on NBC's "The Jay Leno Show" in 2009. Be thankful for law enforcement.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
